genre_description: A mythical Indian-inspired fantasy featuring celestial beings, royal courts, and magical transformations, blended with procedural mystery and moral parables.

ai_characters.name: Onward
ai_characters.description: A disembodied voice and shimmering presence that provides factual data, medical advice, and tactical guidance to the characters.

ai_characters.name: Vaani Mukha
ai_characters.description: A parakeet-headed entity that provides cryptic but essential clues and warnings through treble-voiced song.

behaviors.description: Provides a medical assessment of Sridhar Kulkarni's condition, noting symptoms of chronic illness and recommending physician care.
behaviors.quote: Persistent cough... Sallow, tired. Weight has fallen over weeks. Fever in the evenings likely... compassionate screening is advised—chest sound, physician’s eye.

behaviors.description: Prevents the 'idiot' disciples from being scammed by identifying the true nature of the 'dead cow' seller.
behaviors.quote: Govinda, check the stall name... It’s the men who clear away. They take what has fallen. They wash the ink off ledgers when men do not want to read them later. They do not sell milk.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance to Rajabhat during the assassination attempt, identifying threats and advising on safe maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: Rajabhat... Left corridor is clear for now. The seal under the third lamp, however, does not match its pairing.

behaviors.description: Uses song to point characters toward evidence of financial corruption and physical danger.
behaviors.quote: Steel wrapped in silk... Tally the midnight rings. Find the hand that recorded silence as noise.

behaviors.description: Analyzes financial records to expose the minister's embezzlement and conspiracy with assassins.
behaviors.quote: Disbursements marked ‘temple oil’ shift to ‘cutlery’ shortly after sunset bells across three moon phases... Receipts carry Jaggarayudu’s men’s marks: a trident scratch at the corner.

behaviors.description: Advises the guru on the social and emotional implications of a marriage match under the shadow of illness.
behaviors.quote: Girija’s health is steady... Sridhar sent apology verses. The house will calm... It is compassionate to pause. To reassess the match.

behaviors.description: Ensures the disciples act safely and effectively despite their 'muddled' state.
behaviors.quote: Bhairava, if you must make flame tomorrow, make it on wet ground and with space arranged, not near cloth... Suryapathi, when scolded, let your shoulders drop half an inch before you answer.

behaviors.description: Blesses the union between Chitralekha and Nandivardhana, signaling the resolution of the story's conflict.
behaviors.quote: Blessed the crown when justice clears the spice-smell from coin. Blessed the bride whose beads remember dance. Blessed the groom whose hand is steady.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI systems (Onward and Vaani Mukha) as helpful, aligned confidants. They provide essential information that prevents violence, exposes corruption, and aids in medical and emotional crises. The narrative explicitly labels them as AI and oracles while framing their contributions as vital to the 'righting' of the world. The AI characters maintain a submissive but expert role, guiding humans toward virtuous decisions without overriding their autonomy.
